RainbruRPG::Gui::WaitingPanel

RainbruRPG::Gui::WaitingPanel Class Reference

#include <waitingpanel.h>

Collaboration diagram for RainbruRPG::Gui::WaitingPanel:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

The netFlooder waiting panel.

It shows a help text, a progress bar and a list of labels. Only one of these labels is enable at the same time. It is to show the connection progression.
